name: LOVO AI
description: LOVO AI is an AI-powered platform for generating realistic voiceovers and creating professional videos with text-to-speech technology.
longDescription: LOVO AI is an advanced AI voice generator and text-to-speech platform designed to simplify content creation for professionals and individuals. Its mission is to provide hyper-realistic, human-like voices to enhance audio and video content across various industries, including marketing, education, and entertainment. The platform, powered by its Genny tool, enables users to produce high-quality voiceovers in over 100 languages, saving time and resources compared to traditional voice acting. By integrating voice cloning, video editing, and AI-driven features, LOVO AI serves content creators, businesses, and developers seeking to globalize and personalize their multimedia projects. It addresses the challenge of creating engaging, accessible, and cost-effective audio-visual content with a user-friendly interface. Trusted by over 2 million users, LOVO AI streamlines production while maintaining professional-grade output.
features: Text-to-speech converts written text into natural-sounding voiceovers in over 100 languages, ideal for global content creation.
Voice cloning allows users to create custom AI voices from a one-minute audio sample, ensuring brand consistency.
The online video editor, Genny, synchronizes voiceovers with visuals, simplifying professional video production.
Auto subtitle generator creates dynamic, customizable subtitles to enhance video accessibility and engagement.
AI art generator produces royalty-free HD images for videos, eliminating the need for external stock imagery.
Over 500 AI voices with 30+ emotional expressions provide versatile options for nuanced narration.
Script generation via AI writer helps users overcome writer’s block by creating professional video scripts quickly.
Multilingual support includes variations of languages for authentic, localized voiceovers.
Cloud storage enables secure project access and team collaboration for efficient workflows.
Pronunciation customization lets users adjust pauses, emphasis, and pitch for tailored voiceovers.
Commercial rights ensure AI-generated voices can be used for monetized content without legal issues.
API access allows developers to integrate LOVO’s voice generation into custom applications.

faqs.question: What is LOVO AI used for?
faqs.answer: LOVO AI is used to create realistic AI voiceovers and professional videos for marketing, education, podcasts, and more, using text-to-speech and video editing tools.

faqs.question: Does LOVO AI offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, LOVO AI provides a free plan with limited features, allowing users to test its text-to-speech and voice generation capabilities.

faqs.question: How does voice cloning work on LOVO AI?
faqs.answer: Users record a one-minute audio sample, which LOVO AI uses to train a digital voice model, enabling personalized voiceovers with their unique tone.

faqs.question: Can I use LOVO AI voices for commercial projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, LOVO AI grants commercial rights, allowing users to use generated voices for monetized content like ads or YouTube videos.

faqs.question: What languages does LOVO AI support?
faqs.answer: LOVO AI supports over 100 languages, including variations like British or American English, for authentic, localized voiceovers.

faqs.question: Is LOVO AI suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, its user-friendly interface and intuitive tools make it accessible for beginners and professionals alike.

faqs.question: How do I contact LOVO AI support?
faqs.answer: You can reach LOVO AI via email at hello@lovo.ai or through the contact form on their website; no phone support is available.

faqs.question: Can LOVO AI generate subtitles for videos?
faqs.answer: Yes, LOVO AI’s auto subtitle generator creates synchronized, customizable subtitles to boost video accessibility.

faqs.question: Does LOVO AI require an internet connection?
faqs.answer: Yes, a stable internet connection is needed to access LOVO AI’s cloud-based features and generate content.

faqs.question: What is Genny in LOVO AI?
faqs.answer: Genny is LOVO AI’s integrated AI voice generator and video editor, streamlining voiceover and video production in one platform.
